resources.string: This is the debug screen. However this text will dissapear when data arrives from the server.

--- BUG FIXES
*Fixed local echo text dissapearing after re-entering the window.
*Alias dialog updates.
*Issue with NAWS data not being sent on device rotation.

--- NEW FEATURES
*Support for xterm 256 color codes.
*Alias line matching options.

Visit the website for more details!
http://bt.happygoatstudios.com

---- TEST VERSION 5----
*Slight modification to the alias editor dialog to make all controls viewable.

---- TEST VERSION 4----
*Modified the TTYPE order to fix a problem with auto-settings on Discworld.
*Fixed local echo being lost on window destruction
*Alias Dialog Retooling

--- TEST VERSION 3 ---
*Changed "xterm" to "xterm-256color"
*Alias Dialog Updates
*Alias Parsing Updates (match start & end of lines)

--- TEST VERSION 2----
*Added "xterm" to TERMTYPE query responses, before ""ansi""
*Sending appropriate NAWS data on screen-layout.

---- TEST VERSION 1 ----
*Support for xterm 256 color codes.
